response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This extraordinary item, a testament to innovation and quality, carries a significant value of $15,000 to us. We are offering it to you at this exceptional price, hoping to bring its unique benefits into your possession. Please consider this opportunity to experience the unparalleled features and craftsmanship that come with owning this masterpiece.", "product_price": 15000}
